alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 1:07AM MST until March 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 4000 feet, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory above 2500 feet, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 10 above zero could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
